examples: I have decided to become an oil magnate , after spending quite some time reading the dictionary definition of the word magnate .

definitions.definition: A person of rank , influence or distinction in any sphere.

In medieval and early modern Italy , a member of a legally defined category of especially wealthy patrician families, often deprived of the right to political participation by republican governments .

secondary_definitions: A person of rank , influence or distinction in any sphere.

( historical ) In medieval and early modern Italy , a member of a legally defined category of especially wealthy patrician families, often deprived of the right to political participation by republican governments .
